question: Which country houses the third-largest geothermal power station in the world "Hellisheidi Power Station"?
explanation: Iceland houses the third-largest geothermal power station in the world "Hellisheidi Power Station". The facility is located in Hengill, southwest Iceland. The plant has a capacity of 303 MW of electricity and 133 MWth of hot water for Reykjavik's district heating. Reykjavik is the capital city of Iceland.
